channel.title: I cant sign in server please help
channel.description: when i try to log in server says: error cannot connect to server. i tried to add this in gui/client .java : server = "127.0.0.1"; or server = "0.0.0.0"; and i get an error when doing that, the ip address is used by config.serverName i believe which i opened config.serverName and its equals "localhost" pls help...

item.title: I cant sign in server please help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:1, topic:439487”]when i try to log in server says: error cannot connect to server. i tried to add this in gui/client .java : server = “127.0.0.1”; or
server = “0.0.0.0”; and i get an error when doing that, the ip address is used by config.serverName i believe which i opened config.serverName and its equals “localhost” pls help…[/quote]

From what i can understand from your post it seems you have just forgotten to compile, Or you are experiencing anti-leech
